course_description: This course is designed for students interested in written and oral advocacy in an international context. The goal for this course is to develop your advocacy skills, to introduce you to the workings of international judicial and arbitral tribunals, and to further your interest in a legal career that stretches beyond the boundaries of the United States.
sections: Class Nbr: 5924, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-9p, Instructor: R. Gallo, Status: Open
